beforeInterview.text: This human seems to be a fan of the president. It won't be difficult to convince him of anything.

beforeQuestion.text: Tonight we welcome Mr President! Your morning speech was highly disconcerting! What happened when you visited Area 51?

questions.question: What happened when you visited Area 51?
answers: We are aliens, here to invade earth

afterGoodAnswer.text: I really don't remember anything special. Probably because nothing happened!

beforeQTE.text: Uh, it's not what I meant! I meant, I

afterGoodQTE.text: Ahah... Actually, I really don't remember anything special. Probably because nothing happened!

afterBadQTE.text: Ahah... Actually, I really don't remember anything special. Probably because nothing happened!

beforeQuestion.text: I see... Erm... If I may ask... Your skin seems different than usual, has it something to do with Area 51?

questions.question: Why is your skin different than usual?

afterGoodAnswer.text: It's probably because of the sun. I think I tanned a little. You know how we, humans, love walking in the sun...

beforeQTE.text: Uh, it's not what I meant! I meant, I

afterGoodQTE.text: It's probably because of the sun. I think I tanned a little. You know how we, humans, love walking in the sun...

afterBadQTE.text: Erm... It's probably because of the sun. I think I tanned a little. You know how we, humans, love walking in the sun...

afterInterview.text: Thank you for coming, Mr President. I hope you join us tomorrow! Ladies and gentlemen thank you for watching us, goodnight!
